posts.content: PLEASE HELP A company called All Classics uk Limited in Leicester. I payed a large deposit for a restore on an Early Bay camper. They never delivered the van I took them to court I won but they still have never payed me back. High Court Bailiffs went in but know luck if anyone has any information please come forward. I have gone public with my story on Facebook and you tube my name is Kerry Adams please take the time to watch my story

miles wrote: ↑
Wed Oct 11, 2017 8:35 pm
More information from here:

https://ssvc.org.uk/phpbb/viewtopic.php?f=2&t=119867
Interesting that the SSVC have had an email requesting this that the above thread gets deleted from the said company.... So he's still active.

Kezvilla wrote: ↑
Wed Oct 11, 2017 7:22 pm
PLEASE HELP A company called All Classics uk Limited in Leicester. I payed a large deposit for a restore on an Early Bay camper. They never delivered the van I took them to court I won but they still have never payed me back. High Court Bailiffs went in but know luck if anyone has any information please come forward. I have gone public with my story on Facebook and you tube my name is Kerry Adams please take the time to watch my story

Any links to where you have "gone public"
What an unfortunate situation. I hope you win your case.

I think everyone should watch this video

https://m.facebook.com/video_redirect/? ... tn__=FEH-R

Disgusting and shameful that people like this get away with crimes like this.
So very sad ! I brought a Van from SA and had problems with the Co, but nothing like this. Poor girl. I hope she finds this guy. He will pop up again I'm sure.

Kezvilla wrote: ↑
Wed Oct 11, 2017 7:22 pm
PLEASE HELP A company called All Classics uk Limited in Leicester. I payed a large deposit for a restore on an Early Bay camper. They never delivered the van I took them to court I won but they still have never payed me back. High Court Bailiffs went in but know luck if anyone has any information please come forward. I have gone public with my story on Facebook and you tube my name is Kerry Adams please take the time to watch my story
Having continuing issues of "theft" of an altogether more oblique nature I really feel for you and very much hope you get something back from this.
Stay strong, there's a lot of support out there

This more than proves there is a need perhaps to have a register of people you can trust to take your bus to, I've heard just about enough of bodgsitandscarper guys who milk the crap out of you, say you need this and that, you've not got a clue that's why you took it to someone who knows what there doing in the first place.
For far to long it's been OK to stay silent, let them off the hook, god man, I've known of at least ten people who had there pockets felt in a very large way, and to allow this to continue is not in the best interest of all the people who are doing a good job, brush, tar, it all sticks.
£5,000, £10,000 even sums up to £16,000 are amounts I know have been milked, they now have nothing, dreams gone.
Come on, let's put a stop to this or at least run a book on people you can trust that have the SSVC and Early Bay backing.

Rocket Ron

Thank you i am not letting this go I will keep trying to fight and stop this from happening I have got a petition going on UK government and Parliament if up you please could find the time to visit and put my name in Kerry Adams it will come up please sign I know it's a long shot but you got to try cheers.

Thank you i am not letting this go I will keep trying to fight and stop this from happening I have got a petition going on UK government and Parliament if up you please could find the time to visit and put my name in Kerry Adams it will come up please sign I know it's a long shot but you got to try cheers.
